page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
In Forden Community Centre every Wednesday 6-30 to 8-30 pm there is Youth Club.In Youth Club you can play games like table tennis, badminton, football, rounders, snooker, listen to the record player,Space Invader games, play on the skipping ropes, cricket and lots more things. Most people from Forden go.
Also in the Community Centre we have Brownies.There are three packs - imps, gnomes and pixies.We have a sixer and a seconder of each pack.The sixer has a badge with two lines on it, the seconder has a badge with one line. In Brownies we sometimes have a party.
There is also gymnastics taught by Mrs Oliver.
